desc: We are a small independent company set in The Lake District. We sell only the best toys and accessories for our little ones that are ethical and sustainable!

layout.text:
Hello!
Welcome to Tailor the Foxx
Open Monday to Saturday each week
We are a small, Independant shop based in Kendal, The Lake District in the sunny Cumbrian hills
We specialise in childrens clothing, gifts, books, Handmade items and multiple local designers and craftsmen make the shop a Cumbrian delight
Happy Shopping!
